articles.title: Karo is a to-do app that lets you assign tasks to your friends and family - TechCrunch
articles.description: You can build a reminder and task management system for yourself, and use a service that works for your team. But it might not be easy to get your family
articles.content: You can build a reminder and task management system for yourself, and use a service that works for your team. But it might not be easy to get your family members or friends to use the same task manag… [+3607 chars]
